data.eml:eml: A new species of Characidium Reinhardt (Ostariophysi: Characiformes: Crenuchidae) from coastal rivers in the extreme south of Bahia, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zanata, Angela M., Sarmento-Soares, Luisa M., Martins-Pinheiro, Ronaldo F. (2015): A new species of Characidium Reinhardt (Ostariophysi: Characiformes: Crenuchidae) from coastal rivers in the extreme south of Bahia, Brazil. Zootaxa 4040 (3): 371-383, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4040.3.8
